# List cisst libraries needed
set (CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED cisstCommon
                            cisstVector
                            cisstVectorFLTK
                            cisstOSAbstraction
                            cisstMultiTask)

# Set include/link directories
cisst_set_directories (${CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED})

# CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
fltk_wrap_ui (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK displayUI.fl)

# create a library for the GUI component
add_library (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK ${IS_SHARED}
                displayTask.cpp displayTask.h
                # files generated by fluid
                ${cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
                )

# name the main executable and specify which source files to use
add_executable (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskFLTK
                # code files to compile
                main.cpp
                )

# link with example component library
target_link_libraries (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskFLTK cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents)

# link with the cisst libraries
cisst_target_link_libraries (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK ${CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED})
cisst_target_link_libraries (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskFLTK ${CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED})
